messages.content: What is the purpose of the Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON node?
The Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON node is used for object detection and segmentation based on the Yolov8 model. It outputs related images, masks, and JSON information.
Which models can be loaded using the 'Load Yolov8 Model' node?
The 'Load Yolov8 Model' node allows selecting the Yolov8 model and supports automatic download.
What does the 'Apply Yolov8 Model Seg' node do?
The 'Apply Yolov8 Model Seg' node applies the Yolov8 segmentation model.
What functionality does the 'Save Labelme Json' node provide?
The 'Save Labelme Json' node saves the original image and the corresponding Labelme JSON format file to the output directory, with support for custom directories.
What can be customized when using the 'Draw Labelme Json' node?
When using the 'Draw Labelme Json' node, you can specify the labels to display, change colors, and rename labels based on the Labelme JSON.
What additional node needs to be installed to display JSON formatted data or save it?
To display JSON formatted data or save it, you need to install the Comfyui-Toolbox node in advance.
How can the Yolov8 models be manually downloaded and placed in the specified folder?
The Yolov8 models can be manually downloaded from the Ultralytics GitHub repository and placed in the specified folder structure under 'models/yolov8' within the ComfyUI directory.
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点的主要功能是什么？
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点主要基于yolov8模型进行物体检测，并输出相关的图片、蒙版和JSON信息。
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点支持哪些类型的yolov8模型？
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点支持yolov8检测模型和yolov8分割模型两种类型的推理。
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点如何保存检测结果？
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点通过Save Labelme Json节点将原图和对应的Labelme JSON格式文件保存到output目录中，支持自定义目录。
使用Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点需要安装哪些依赖？
使用Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点需要安装Comfyui-Toolbox节点以及官方提供的python包，可以通过运行pip install -r requirements.txt命令安装。
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点支持自动下载模型吗？
是的，Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点支持自动下载yolov8模型。用户也可以选择手动下载模型到指定文件夹models/yolov8中。
手动下载的yolov8模型需要放在什么位置？
手动下载的yolov8模型需要放在ComfyUI/models/yolov8目录下，对应不同的模型文件如yolov8l.pt、yolov8s.pt等。
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点如何基于labelJSON在图片上绘制识别框和输出mask？
Comfyui-Yolov8-JSON节点使用Draw Labelme Json节点可以基于labelJSON在图片基础上绘制识别框并输出mask，支持指定显示的标签和变色，以及更改标签名称。
